publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5646 Christine Grahame: The Independent Republic of Kelso High School—That the Parliament notes the declaration of independence from Britain by Kelso High School in the Scottish Borders; endorses the new-found freedoms which independent republican Kelsonian pupils have discovered, and further recognises the right of people in Kelso and the rest of Scotland to independence in order that the voices of our nation are heard directly, reflecting our distinctive interests and contributions to the international community.

S2M-5646 Christine Grahame: The Independent Republic of Kelso High School—That the Parliament notes the declaration of independence from Britain by Kelso High School in the Scottish Borders; endorses the new-found freedoms which independent republican Kelsonian pupils have discovered, and further recognises the right of people in Kelso and the rest of Scotland to independence in order that the voices of our nation are heard directly, reflecting our distinctive interests and contributions to the international community. Supported by: Michael Matheson*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Rob Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-5646 The Independent Republic of Kelso High School (lodged on 22 February 2007) Mr Adam Ingram*

S2M-5646 Christine Grahame: The Independent Republic of Kelso High School—That the Parliament notes the declaration of independence from Britain by Kelso High School in the Scottish Borders; endorses the new-found freedoms which independent republican Kelsonian pupils have discovered, and further recognises the right of people in Kelso and the rest of Scotland to independence in order that the voices of our nation are heard directly, reflecting our distinctive interests and contributions to the international community. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Rob Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Mr Adam Ingram
